channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- GetResponse for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- GetResponse for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-0167|2024-08-02T05:02:43.799Z -- unknown -- getresponse%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The GetResponse for WordPress plugin through 5.5.31 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
